text: 1992 King Fahd Cup was the first King Fahd Cup tournament. It took place in Saudi Arabia from 15 October to 20 October. Argentina won the tournament after defeating Saudi Arabia. United States got third place. ==Results== {{Round4-with third |16 October – Riyadh||4||0 |15 October – Riyadh||0||3 |20 October – Riyadh||3||1 |19 October – Riyadh||5||2 }} ==References== ==Other websites== *RSSSF Category:FIFA Confederations Cup tournaments Category:1992 in Asian football Category:1990s in Saudi Arabia Category:Football in Saudi Arabia
title: 1992 King Fahd Cup
